info.name: autohide the menu & sidebar [BBC News] v1
info.description: Hides the BBC header, footer, and sidebar. (But not permanently - hover at the edges of the screen to restore them.)
info.additionalInfo: The icons in the upper-left and lower-right corners of the screen are the collapsed header and footer. The dotted blue line at the left edge of the screen is the collapsed sidebar. Mouse over them to restore the element. Testing... http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-europe-24363776
